name: a touch of romance
description:
Love. Dating. Marriage.

Who needs all that anymore? Short-term flings, one-night stands, and pass-out parties are all you need nowadays. Have a different sexual partner at the end of every week. Enjoy yourself with the right gifts given to the right people. Say no to pro-choice in child abortion and advocate for pro-life. Continue to declare birth control a sin against humanity. Make money by being something you are not and elevate yourself to the status of Michael Jordan. Only you are as great as Michael Jordan. Everyone else is a poser and are not Michael Jordan. Only you are not the poser.

Follow these steps and you will never need to get married to have your own home, children, and romance. Let the moolah flow. Let people waste millions on you. Because you are as great as Michael Jordan. No, you are better than Michael Jordan.

Enjoy more modern horror in this short visual novel "a touch of romance" built using the TyranoBuilder engine.

What is this game about? It's a modern horror. You're not supposed to know until you read through this short visual novel.

Spoilers ruin the fright.
